predicate.note: Frames file for 'expedite' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yesterday 's vote on Japanese-American reparations ensures final enactment of the entitlement provision , which [*T*-1] abandons earlier efforts [*] to find offsetting cuts but is seen [*-2] as a more realistic path to [*] expediting compensation first authorized [*] in 1988 .
